front.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Managing Natural Disaster Impact on key electrical systems and installations in Petroleum and Chemical Facilities

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This document provides recommendations and guidelines for managing natural disaster impact on key electrical facilities and systems in petroleum and chemical facilities in order to minimize economic damage by pre-assessment risk evaluation of electrical facilities, by identification of mitigation techniques and systems designs to minimize impact, and by outlining procedures for faster recovery of electrical systems after a natural disaster.
